parsed_email.subject: Re: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading
parsed_email.body_text:
Message: 8454809
From: Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>
To: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Cc: Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>,Accounts - Hellas Shipping Agencies <accounts@hellas-shipping.com.br>
Date: Fri, 09/Jan/2026 14:54:20 (UTC: +02:00)
Subject: Re: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading

Dear Ms. Dimitra Ioannidou, Good day!

Kindly be informed we can remove both free of charge.

Our best regards,


Gabriel Felipe

Attending all ports of South and Central America. Head office in 

Brazil and branch offices at Argentina, Uruguay, Peru and Venezuela

Gabriel Felipe

Mobile number: +55 13 997645095 




Em sex., 9 de jan. de 2026 às 05:44, Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com> escreveu:
Message Number: 767991
From: ops@astraship.com
To: HELLAS SHIPPING BR (operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br)
Cc: operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br
Sent: Friday, Jan 9, 2026 10:44 (UTC +02:00)
Subject: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading

Dear Gabriel, 
 
Good Day.
 
Please see below estimated breakdown of garbage and sludge on arrival Paranagua:

Dimitra Ioannidou

6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece

_________________Original Message_________________

Message: 8451892
From: HELLAS SHIPPING BR <Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>>
Subject: Re: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading
Date: January 8th 2026, 17:15:16
To: Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com>
Cc: Operations - Hellas Shipping Agencies <operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br>

 
Dear Ms. Dimitra Ioannidou, Good day!

Costs for such services are generally based on the quantities involved and are calculated per cubic meter or ton, depending on the type of waste. In certain cases, and subject to the quantities of sludge to be discharged, it may be possible to obtain reduced rates or even full cost waivers.

In order to proceed with a more accurate evaluation and cost discussion, we kindly request that you provide the estimated quantities and categories of materials to be discharged.

Our best regards,


Gabriel Felipe

Attending all ports of South and Central America. Head office in 

Brazil and branch offices at Argentina, Uruguay, Peru and Venezuela
 

Gabriel Felipe

 

Mobile number: +55 13 997645095 

 
Em qui., 8 de jan. de 2026 às 09:29, Operations - Astra Shipmanagement Inc <ops@astraship.com> escreveu:
Message Number: 767763
From: ops@astraship.com
To: HELLAS SANTOS (operations1@hellas-shipping.com.br)
Sent: Thursday, Jan 8, 2026 14:28 (UTC +02:00)
Subject: Pelagia Voy.02 // Paranagua for loading
Dear Sirs, 
 
Good Day.
 
Kindly advise availability of reception facilities for sludge/oily water/wash water/sewage/garbage, cost per cbm or ton and procedures for ordering such operation.
Please advise if any disposal is compulsory. In addition to this, kindly advise whether the providers are ISO14001 approved.
 
Awaiting yours.
 
Best Regards,
Dimitra Ioannidou
Operations Dept.

Astra Shipmanagement Inc
(as agents only)
6 Vouliagmenis Avenue & 12 Nirvana St.
Voula, 166 73
Athens - Greece
Tel: +30 213 0175 106
Prioritizing the wellbeing of our planet and its people.

classification.summary: The email confirms that garbage disposal services can be provided free of charge for the vessel Pelagia.
